TextView.android:text: ExamCoach Information Centre Pvt Ltd has always solemnly promised to protect the privacy of users who use ExamCoach’s products and service (collectively “User” or “you”). This privacy policy (the “Privacy Policy”) therefore intends to inform you about how ExamCoach, acting as data controller, collects and processes your personal data that you submit or disclose to us. Please note that in such a case, we may not be able to Provide you with our services, you may not have access to and/or be able to use some features of the Website and App, and your customer experience may be impacted.

(I) Information not directly related to your personal identity: When you use ExamCoach Service, we may collect and process information such as the user’s source route, access sequence and so on, such as record the source route and browser software of each User who uses ExamCoach Service.
Information related to your personal identity: When you use ExamCoach Service , we may collect and process or request you to Provide information related to personal identity, such as personal identification (including ID card, passport, and driver license); date of birth, place of birth, gender, hobbies, personal phone number, facial features; online identification information (including system account, IP address, email address, and password and answers to password protection of the foregoing); personal property information (including dealing records, balances, coupons, game exchange codes, and bank card information); communication information; personal online records and log information (including website browsing records, software usage records, click records, and operation logs); device information (including device model, device MAC address, operating system type and device settings); software list unique device identifier (such as IMEI/android ID/IDFA/OPENUDID/GUID, information describing basic information of personal devices including IMSI information of the SIM card); location information (including trip information, precise positioning information, accommodation information, and latitude and longitude). Please note that if you upload or post information in public areas that are visible to other users in ExamCoach Service and you disclose your personal information in response to information uploaded or posted by others, such information may be collected and used by others. When you find that ExamCoach users improperly collect or use information from you or others, please contact info@ExamCoach.com

(II) COOKIES, log archives and WEB BEACON

However, you should be able to control whether and how COOKIES is accepted by your browser. Please check the documentation attached to your browser for more information on this.
